function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures in restaurants and cafes","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sending food to healthcare workers in various hospitals may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene measures are not taken in the food preparation and delivery process.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Frequent change in customer preferences during turbulent environments may lead to challenges in maintaining food safety standards and hygiene practices.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased foot traffic in restaurants and cafes","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in home delivery services leading to higher interaction between delivery personnel and customers","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in persuading people to purchase ready-made food due to safety concerns","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of the virus within bank branches due to close customer and employee interactions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance from customers intimidated by increased digitalization, leading to potential exclusion from banking services","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate decision-making by customers during distress, leading to potential financial challenges","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effective marketing may have led to increased borrowing and debt accumulation","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rising trend in online shopping and credit card usage","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Drop in credit card expenditures","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging businesses to take on new loans or extend existing loans could increase financial vulnerability and debt burden.","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simplified procedures for banking transactions could lead to increased cyber security risks.","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High usage of call centers","category":"Finances","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reduction in business volumes due to limited access to physical branches and preference for face-to-face banking.","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty stemming from the interdependence of participants in an exchange","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crisis situations can damage a quality relationship","category":"Finances","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Bank customers are results driven and care about functional quality","category":"Finances","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Difficulty in maintaining social distancing and following lockdown rules while conducting banking activities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in implementing new ways of interaction","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of services to the new normal","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of personalized experiences leading to customer dissatisfaction and reduced loyalty.","category":"Finances","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remote services and virtual try-ons may lead to a decrease in in-store foot traffic, impacting physical retailers and the local economy.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of technology for shelf monitoring and clean surfaces may lead to data privacy and cybersecurity risks.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long-term effects on consumer psyche from pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctance to engage in consumer Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New habits and behaviors adopted during covid-19 crisis likely to persist","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research on green brand equity in the context of covid-19 post-pandemic","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Innovative products and marketing strategies in response to underestimating the risk of contagion due to strong brand loyalty and trust","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate risk assessment and management of contagion in brand
